title.rendered: Willyrex responds to those who criticize him for launching his own NFTs

content.rendered:
Willyrex decided to join the NFT craze (Non Fungible Token) last March and was highly criticized for showing these exclusives digital artwork or crypto art. Now the youtuber is back on everyone’s lips after put on sale their first pieceswhich have sold out quickly.

Already at the beginning of this year he showed his first work but it was not until this past week that he started in business. Despite initial criticism from those who thought bringing out these exclusive NFTs was a danger to his younger audienceafter auctioning these virtual pieces they have received numerous bids until reaching some piece the $15,000.

The exorbitant price, once again filled the network of critics for the disastrous influence it can have on the smallest followers.

Willyrex responds to criticism

The youtuber, far from cutting himself off, used his Twitter profile to warn the most critical and skeptical and assured them: “Do not delete the tweets that we will all laugh at once.” But this was only the beginning of his chain of tweets: “I don’t know how you can be so short-minded when everyone is screaming it! Facebook, EA, Ubisoft, most football and eSports teams already have or will have” , assured before adding that “Nothing, it’s all a scam… just like buying online, they steal your card.”

“Obviously there are going to be people taking advantage of doing evil, as happens with anything. But using it as an excuse only makes you be at the end of the queue about what you will use in a few years,” Willyrex commented on those who are concerned that can be misused. “I don’t advise you to buy anything, literally 90 or 95% of projects will be worth 0,” he says.

Finally, he explained that other artists were interested in the business: “Also, it is the greatest revolution for artists that has ever existed, removing intermediaries and connecting directly with your audience. In fact, in the last few days I have been written by quite a few influencersyoutubers and artists to learn about the subject”.
